summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE OVERHEATED AND THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED ON THE DASHBOARD.  *NM  THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A LETTER FROM THE MANUFACTURER WHICH STATED THAT SOME VEHICLE EQUIPPED WITH 1.9 LITER ENGINES MAY DEVELOP A CRACK INTERNAL TO THE CYLINDER HEAD.  THE LETTER ALSO STATED THAT THIS SPECIAL POLICY PROVIDED COVERAGE FOR A PERIOD OF 6 YEARS/100000 MILES.  AT APPROXIMATELY 45000 MILES A CRACK WAS DISCOVERED.   THE DEALER REFUSED TO REPAIR THE VEHICLE UNTIL THE CONSUMER AUTHORIZED A $500. DIAGNOSTIC.  THE CONSUMER REFUSED.  *NM
